    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2427</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">¿Los mensajes de móvil son un lenguaje?</string>
            <string language="en">Are SMS messages a language?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sind SMS Meldungen eine Sprache?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les messages de SMS sont-ils un langage ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">São as mensagens de SMS uma língua?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sono i messaggi di SMS un linguaggio?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι τα μηνύματα SMS μια γλώσσα;</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que descriu el llenguatge utilitzat en els missatges de mòbil mitjançant l'abreviació i l'ús de les emoticones. Conté una icona que permet imprimir el text.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) describing the language used in mobile phone text messages, which uses abbreviations and emoticons. It includes a print option.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tecnologia dels mitjans de comunicació</string>
            <string language="en">media technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comunicació no verbal</string>
            <string language="en">nonverbal communication</string>
            <string language="es">comunicación no verbal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">suport a l'ensenyament</string>
            <string language="en">teaching aids</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und beantworten Sie (das DURCHSCHNITTLICHE) 
Beschreiben der Sprache, die in den Textmeldungen des beweglichen 
Telefons verwendet wird, die Abkürzungen und Emoticons benutzt. 
Sie schließt eine Druckoption ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remettez en cause et répondez à décrire (PAR) le 
langage utilisé dans des messages des textes de mobilophone, qui 
utilise des abréviations et des émoticônes. Il inclut une 
option d'impression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda a descrever (PAR) a língua usada em 
mensagens do texto do telefone móvel, que usa abreviaturas e 
emoticons. Inclui uma opção da cópia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a descrivere (PAR) il linguaggio usato 
nei messaggi del testo del telefono mobile, che usa le abbreviazioni 
ed i emoticons. Include un'opzione della stampa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) που περιγράφουν τη γλώσσα που
χρησιμοποιείται στα κινητά μηνύματα τηλεφωνικών κειμένων, η 
οποία χρησιμοποιεί τις συντμήσεις και emoticons. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια προαιρετική δυνατότητα τυπωμένων υλών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mediatechnologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ohne Worte Kommunikation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie de medias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission non-verbale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aides pédagogiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tecnologia dos media</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma comunicação nonverbal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dae (dispositivo automático de entrada) de ensino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnologia di media</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comunicazione nonverbal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sussidi didattici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεχνολογία μέσων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μη λεκτική επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενισχύσεις διδασκαλίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
